alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 15 at 7:30PM PDT until August 19 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Afternoon temperatures in the mid 90s to around 100, with overnight lows in the 60s, in the lower elevations. * WHERE...Loomis, Winthrop, Conconully, Leavenworth, Telma, Dryden, Carlton, Twisp, Methow, Plain, Winton, Peshastin, and Mazama. * WHEN...From Noon Wednesday to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those sensitive to heat. Residents without air conditioners will experience a buildup of heat within their homes during the afternoon and evening hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heat may continue into the weekend. There is a chance the advisory may later need to be extended through Sunday.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
